    call("java.util.Scanner.next()", label_2, var1, in_meth), 
    var_condition(var1, label_2, in_meth),
    sat_transition(label_check, in_meth, label_2, in_meth).

    ret_var = var1.

    flow_reach(label_check, in_meth, label_2, in_meth).
